content: have been incorporated ending with a right side sherman toe per instructions given on page page 7 row final ws gusset stitch will be worked on the first when toe is complete divide sole stitches between round of leg needles 1 and 4 and instep stitches betweeen needles 2 and 3 size l 31 33 instep and 29 33 sole stitches right side setup sl 1 k1 p2 k5 p1 k5 two times p2 k2tog ssk last heel stitch with first gusset stitch instep turn size m from start of round work sole stitches in stockinette wrong side row sl1 p1 k2 p5 k1 p5 two times work instep stitches as follows k2 p1 p2tog last heel stitch with first gusset stitch k3 p1 k5 p1 k5 three times p1 k3 turn size l right side row sl1 k1 p2 k5 p1 k5 two times p2 from start of round work sole stitches in stockinette k1 ssk last heel stitch with first gusset stitch turn and work instep stitches as follows k3 p1 k5 p2 k5 p1 two times k3 repeat last two row until all gusset stitches on left side of heel have been incorporated ending with a right side work until instep measures 3½ 4 inches less than row final ws gusset stitch will be worked on the first total foot length round of leg brenda dayne © 2014 all rights reserved no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or transmitted in any form or by any means without the written permission of the author 4 welsh for rainbow leg begin working in the round again working pattern as set across instep stitches to final gusset stitch close the gap that forms between instep and gusset stitches as follows lift the strand between last instep stitch and gusset stitch onto needle to create an extra stitch then k3 together to get rid of the extra stitch 60 65 sts continue pattern as set until leg measures 2½ 3 inches from final gusset stitch on final round of leg from beginning of round place markers as follows size m p1 k5 p1 k5 pm four times size l p1 k5 p1 k5 p1 pm four times begin lace pattern using chart appropriate for size work five repeats of chart per round ribbing size m beginning with first stitch of next round * p1 k2 repeat from * across all stitches for 16 rounds size l beginning with first stitch of next round * p1 k2 four times p1 repeat from * across all stitches for 20 rounds finishing bind off using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off weave in all ends lightly steam block make a second sock to match the first brenda dayne © 2014 all rights reserved no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or transmitted in any form or by any means without the written permission of the author 5 tintern abbey size medium gothic arches m repeats over 12 sts 28
